content: Wouldn't it make sense to replace the JSON decoding/encoding stuff in rustc_serialize with something like serde at some point? https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/compiler/rustc_serialize/src/json.rs has been written many many years ago, surely there's much faster JSON parsing available now that the compiler could make use of instead of still using its own JSON implementation from when there weren't many JSON libraries available for Rust yet.
There was an attempt to do that here, but there are some complications noted in that PR.
fwiw, I'm currently working on some more targeted cleanup, but I think full removal indeed likely wants some broader discussion (e.g., MCP)
